GeometryAttribute Class

Defined in: src/davinci-eight/geometries/GeometryAttribute.ts:54
Module: EIGHT

Holds all the values of a particular attribute. The size property describes how to break up the values. The length of the values should be an integer multiple of the size.

var x = 3;

Constructor

GeometryAttribute

(
  • values
  • size
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/GeometryAttribute.ts:54

Parameters:

  • values VectorN
  • size Number
  • Index
